description.narrative: The Electoral Observation Mission (MOE) is a national civil society organization and long-time partner to Sida in the area of democratic strengthening in Colombia. Sida has decided to transition from project to a core-support for MOE’s Strategic Plan 2022-2025. The Strategic Plan presents an integral approach to address democratic deficits as drivers of the protracted armed conflict, high levels of poverty and inequality, and human rights violations in Colombia. The plan will be implemented over a 48-month period with a country-wide coverage facilitated by MOE’s partnerships with local civil society organizations in 35 regions (not through forwarding of funds). Sida’s contribution amounts to 16.000.00 SEK, representing 61% of the total budget required for its implementation (26.000.000 SEK), while the rest shall be covered by other donors.

Valobservatörsmissionen (Electoral Observation Mission, MOE) är en nationell civilsamhällesorganisation och en mångårig partner till Sida inom demokratiområdet i Colombia. Sida kommer att ge kärnstöd till MOE för deras Strategiplan 2022-2025. Den strategiska planen avser att motverka det demokratiska underskottet som bidrar till den utdragna väpnade konflikten, höga nivåer av fattigdom, ojämlikhet och kränkningar av mänskliga rättigheter. Planen kommer att genomföras under en 48-månadersperiod med en landsomfattande täckning som underlättas av MOE:s partnerskap med lokala civilsamhällesorganisationer i 35 regioner (inte genom vidareförmedling av medel). Sidas bidrag uppgår till 16 000 000 SEK, vilket motsvarar 61% av den totala budget som krävs för genomförandet (26 000 000 SEK). Resterande skall täckas av andra givare.

The general objective of the contribution is to strengthen citizen participation in public decision-making processes and building more democratic relations between citizenry and State.
MOEs strategic plan incorporates four specific objectives:
- To strengthen political and democratic participation and representation, with a focus on historically marginalized groups as women, LGBTIQ population, youth and people with disabilities.
- To improve technical dialogue on electoral and political issues between civil society organizations and State institutions, incorporating diverse perspectives in terms of territories, populations, and cultures.
- To foster transparency, access to information and the adequate use of public funds to counter corruption.
- To promote policies that provide security guarantees for political participation.

tag.narrative: 16.5 - Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms.
16.5 - Väsentligt minska alla former av korruption och mutor.
16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
